Package org.simexid.odoo.controller

Class CrmController

java.lang.Object
org.simexid.odoo.controller.CrmController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${simexid.crm.api-path}") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="simexid.crm.api-enabled", havingValue="true", matchIfMissing=false) public class CrmController extends Object
Controller for Odoo CRM query operations

  • Method Details

    • getWebhooksSaleorder

      @PostMapping("/webhooks/saleorder") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> getWebhooksSaleorder(@RequestBody SaleOrderHook input, @RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get sale order webhooks
      Parameters:
      input - SaleOrderHook object
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error the api is used for intercept odoo webhooks for a sale order

    • getWebhooksSaleorderline

      @PostMapping("/webhooks/saleorderline") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> getWebhooksSaleorderline(@RequestBody SaleOrderLineHook input, @RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get sale order line webhooks
      Parameters:
      input - SaleOrderLineHook object
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error the api is used for intercept odoo webhooks for a sale order line

    • getPartners

      @GetMapping("/partners") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Customer>> getPartners(@RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get all partners
      Parameters:
      key - API key
      Returns:
      List of Customer objects

    • getPartner

      @GetMapping("/partner/{field}/{criteria}/{search}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Customer>> getPartner(@PathVariable CrmSearchEnum.SearchField field, @PathVariable CrmSearchEnum.SearchOperator criteria, @PathVariable String search, @RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get partner
      Parameters:
      field - SearchField enum
      criteria - SearchOperator enum
      search - Search criteria
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of partners/customer for the search criteria, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

    • getSales

      @GetMapping("/sales/{field}/{criteria}/{search}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SaleOrder>> getSales(@PathVariable CrmSearchEnum.SearchField field, @PathVariable CrmSearchEnum.SearchOperator criteria, @PathVariable Object search, @RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get sales
      Parameters:
      field - SearchField enum
      criteria - SearchOperator enum
      search - Search criteria
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of sales for the search criteria, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

    • getFields

      @GetMapping("fields/search/{model}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getFields(@PathVariable CrmSearchEnum.Model model, @RequestParam("apikey") String key)
      Get fields
      Parameters:
      model - Model enum
      key - API key
      Returns:
      StatusCode 200 if successful and a list of fields for the model, 401 if unauthorized, 500 if internal server error

      Parameters:
      model - Model enum
      key - API key
      Returns:
